CustomField.description: The fully qualified name of an Apex class that implements the PatternPlugin interface. Only used when Logic_Type__c is set to Apex_Plugin. The class must be global and implement both analyze() and fix() methods.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the Apex class name (e.g., MyCustomPlugin or MyNamespace.MyPlugin). The class must implement the PatternPlugin interface.
CustomField.label: Apex Handler Class
